attributes.action: Award a posthumous Military Cross to the late Walter Tull for his actions in the first world war.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Walter Tull was the first black proffesional footballer, and the first black officer to command combat troops during many battles on the Western Front during WW1. He was recommended for this medal but never recieved it. Now is the right time to correct this error.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the Ministry of Defence.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
